data.title: Podcast: In Good Company
data.meta_description: Our CEO Nicolai Tangen interviews leaders of some of the largest companies in the world. Get to know the leaders and the companies the fund is invested in.
data.text: We are transparent about how the fund is invested. In this podcast, you get a deeper insight into the companies the fund is invested in. Our CEO, Nicolai Tangen, has in-depth interviews with CEOs of some of the largest companies in the world. You will get insight into their leadership principles, the companyâ€™ strategy and how they are dealing with a large investor like us. You will also learn more about our role as an owner of the companies.
